title: Aronson LLC Launches Financial Advisory Services Practice
text:
Aronson LLC has offered a wide range of financial advisory services for many years. By launching this new practice, Aronson will centralize these skills and resources to provide clients with a higher level of service in their core service offerings.
Rockville, Maryland (PRWEB) October 05, 2015
Aronson LLC , a nationally ranked top 100 assurance, tax, and consulting firm, recently announced the launch of its Financial Advisory Services practice . Core service offerings include forensic accounting and litigation support, valuations, transaction services, M&A advisory, corporate finance, and strategic advisory.
“We have offered financial advisory services to middle-market companies, entrepreneurs, private equity groups, investors, lenders, and attorneys for many years—and we’ve assembled a fantastic team of professionals in the process,” said Jeffery Capron , Managing Partner at Aronson. “Realigning our service platform in these disciplines will streamline our operations and enable us to service our clients more effectively.”
“Our clients face constant pressure to grow their businesses, improve performance, reduce risks, and navigate crises,” commented Bill Foote , Partner at Aronson. “Our Financial Advisory Services platform centralizes the skills and resources that will help our clients face these challenges head-on.”
About Aronson LLC
Aronson LLC has been thinking ahead for its clients for more than 50 years. Aronson’s government contracting, construction and real estate, nonprofit, and technology experts provide innovative assurance, tax, and consulting services that help its clients move to the next level. From start-up to exit strategy, Aronson works with companies throughout the entire business lifecycle by proactively identifying opportunities and addressing challenges so that clients are able to focus on their core business. For more information about Aronson LLC, visit http://www.aronsonllc.com and follow us at @AronsonLLC for news and updates.
